Ramhorn/Smokescreen/Beachcomber:




Ramhorn had stepped outside after Smokescreen and Beachcomber had told him 
everything.  The Maximal scientist was looking at the damage.  Badly injured 
robots.  Extensive damage to the Ark.  It would take to long to repair.  To 
long in the war.  Someone coudl attack.  And crush them finally. 
"We have to take drastic measures.  We've been going down the tubes.  Attack 
after attack after attack weakens us.  Every attack we do worse.  Do you know 
what causes it?" Ramhorn asked.

"Errr...bad guns?" Smokescreen guessed stupidly.

"We're outnumbered?" Beachomber said with a more probable answer.

"Errr...no.  'Good' guesses though.  "Bad leadership.  Really bad leadership. 
 Terrible leadership."

"From Liono Prime?" Beachcomber asked, knowing the answer though.  Who else 
could he be talking about?

"Yes.  We need to hold a no-confidence vote.  Iron Raptor needs to get in 
charge.  From what you've told me, she risked her life just to try and calm 
down an insane robot.  Or at least insane with rage.  Deeds like that are 
what the Maximals are all about.  Peaceful solutions.  We're pacifists.  Weak 
in some eyes, but we're strong.  Iron Raptor has reminded me or what a 
Maximal is."  

"War sometimes makes the Autobots and ourselves forget our principles.  
Rarely with the Autobots, unfortunately not so rare with us.  Iron Raptor is 
the best choice for our leader.  Strong.  Intelligent.  Sane.  Thoughtful.  
Caring.  Courageous.  And if needed, one skid plate-kicking warrior as she's 
proved time, and time again."

"Woah." Beachcomber commented, letting everything sink in, since he'd only 
been there for a while.

"Should we go tell everyone?" Smokescreen asked, excitement in his voice.

"What?  Now?  Are you slagging crazy!?  With the Ark in ruins, and our troops 
half dead?  We won't be voting until AFTER the Ark is repaired.  We can't be 
in a meeting room now with all our troops near death and our base near 
blowing up."

"Need us to get you to a CR chamber?" Beachcomber concerned, hearing they 
weren't to spread the news quite yet.

"No.  You go find Iron Raptor and get some orders.  Ask her what to do.  I'm 
sure she'll know."

"Ok." Beachcomber and Smokescreen said in unison, walking off towards Iron 
Raptor, seeing her, Archangel, and Prowl together.

--

After the two other Maximals had left, Ramhorn activated his com.  
<Plintissa, this is Ramhorn.  Follow the source of my com.  I need to speak 
with you.  It is VERY important.  I urge you to come, despite 
our...differences.>  

---

Beachcomber and Smokescreen appraoched Iron Raptor.

"Requestion orderes, ma'am." they asked in unison.
